17 #ifndef __G_SOURCECLOSURE_H__
18 #define __G_SOURCECLOSURE_H__
19 
20 #if !defined (__GLIB_GOBJECT_H_INSIDE__) && !defined (GOBJECT_COMPILATION)
21 #error "Only <glib-object.h> can be included directly."
22 #endif
23 
24 #include <gobject/gclosure.h>
25 #include <gobject/glib-types.h>
26 
27 G_BEGIN_DECLS
28 
29 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
30 void g_source_set_closure        (GSource  *source,
31                   GClosure *closure);
32 
33 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
34 void g_source_set_dummy_callback (GSource  *source);
35 
36 G_END_DECLS
37 
38 #endif /* __G_SOURCECLOSURE_H__ */
